_sText:
XMAS Version Merry xmas to all this is piratewars 2010 updated and turned xmas. Texture changes, added xmas stuff (island, hat, ect ect), music, and a few secrets. Enjoy (Forgot to take screenshots on this pc so using an older screenshot doesn't show every new thing but oh well.)

-Use this map during Winter only please and replace piratewars 2010 with it for the Christmas season.-

Use cannons to sink the other teams boat, or to kill them by hitting them with cannonballs which do 50 damage, or knife them to death.

Set up for 40 spawns.
Please contact me before decompiling or using anything in here by messaging me here or finding me in game. My steam id would be Tomgreen STEAM_0:0:7598918 Please leave comments on the map so I know if you liked it in order to work on similar ideas ect..
